mapper.select: SELECT NAME as "name", NET_IN as "netIn", NET_OUT as "netOut", REACT_COUNT as "reactCount", R_QUEUE as "rQueue", W_QUEUE as "wQueue", FREE_BUFFER as "freeBuffer", TOTAL_BUFFER as "totalBuffer", BU_PERCENT as "buPercent", BU_WARNS as "buWarns", FC_COUNT as "fcCount", BC_COUNT as "bcCount", create_time as "createTime", mycat_name as "mycatName" FROM t_mycat_showprocessor
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_mycat_showprocessor ( NAME, NET_IN, NET_OUT, REACT_COUNT, R_QUEUE, W_QUEUE, FREE_BUFFER, TOTAL_BUFFER, BU_PERCENT, BU_WARNS, FC_COUNT, BC_COUNT, create_time, mycat_name ) VALUES ( #{NAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NET_IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{NET_OUT, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{REACT_COUNT, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{R_QUEUE, jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{W_QUEUE, jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{FREE_BUFFER, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{TOTAL_BUFFER, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{BU_PERCENT, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{BU_WARNS, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{FC_COUNT, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{BC_COUNT, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=DateHandler}, #{mycatName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_mycat_showprocessor
NAME = #{name},
NET_IN = #{netIn},
NET_OUT = #{netOut},
REACT_COUNT = #{reactCount},
R_QUEUE = #{rQueue},
W_QUEUE = #{wQueue},
FREE_BUFFER = #{freeBuffer},
TOTAL_BUFFER = #{totalBuffer},
BU_PERCENT = #{buPercent},
BU_WARNS = #{buWarns},
FC_COUNT = #{fcCount},
BC_COUNT = #{bcCount},
create_time = #{createTime},
mycat_name = #{mycatName}
